title: Darling do you love me?
creator_credit: BFI, Martin Sharp and Bob Whittaker
brief_description: A cynical and comical view of “love” in which a woman drives herself into a frenzy when demanding that her lover declare his affections. Germaine Greer as the large vampire lady, pursues and assaults her lover (Alister Burke) with cries of “Darling, do you love me?”, until he expires under her stranglehold.
